sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react'; import GetInstance from '../instance'; import EducationLoan from '../ethereum/build/EducationLoan.json'; import { Menu, Card, Button, Divider, Form, Grid, Segment, Dimmer, Loader, List } from 'semantic-ui-react'; const names = ["Srv1", "Srv2"]; class StudentDashboard extends Component { static getInitialProps({ query }) { return { query }; } state = { account: '', loanAddress: '', web3: undefined, instance: undefined, eduLoanInstance: undefined, listItems: [] } async componentDidMount() { this.setState({ loanAddress: this.props.query.loanAddress }); const { web3, instance } = await new GetInstance().get(); const accounts = await web3.eth.getAccounts(); const eduLoanInstance = await new web3.eth.Contract(JSON.parse(EducationLoan.interface), this.state.loanAddress); console.log(`Edu-Loan Instance: ${eduLoanInstance.options.address}`); this.setState({ web3, instance, eduLoanInstance, account: accounts[0] }); } render() { return (
Edu-Ledger

Your Address:

{this.state.account}

Loan Address:

{this.state.loanAddress}

History

{ this.state.listItems.map((item)=>{ return ( {item.itemText} ) }) }
); } } export default StudentDashboard;
